name: Cara's Crispy Orange Cauliflower. Vegan Glutenfree Recipe
description: This vegan gluten-free crispy Orange Cauliflower is so addictive that you will want it for every dinner. delicious, easy and must make. Can be soy-free
recipeIngredient: 1  small head of cauliflower (cut into small florets (I used a pre-package of cauliflower bought from Trader Joe's))
1 tbsp flaxseed meal + 2 Tb water (allow to sit until thickens)
1/4 cup Cara's gluten-free flour blend (or use wheat/other flour)
zest of 1 orange + juice of orange
2 Tbsp soy sauce (gluten-free , or use coconut aminos to make soy-free)

itemListElement.text: Blend all ingredients together until a nice batter is formed (shouldn't be too thick: think waffle batter consistency).
itemListElement.name: Blend all ingredients together until a nice batter is formed (shouldn't be too thick: think waffle batter consistency).

itemListElement.text: While you are doing this, heat up a skillet with 1/2 c. oil on medium/high heat. Make sure it has been properly heated.
itemListElement.name: While you are doing this, heat up a skillet with 1/2 c. oil on medium/high heat. Make sure it has been properly heated.

itemListElement.text: Dip each small floret into the batter and make sure each piece is entirely covered.
itemListElement.name: Dip each small floret into the batter and make sure each piece is entirely covered.

itemListElement.text: Fry in oil until completely browned. * or Bake at 425 degrees F / 220ºc for 25 to 30 minutes. Add more flour to the batter to make it thick if needed
itemListElement.name: Fry in oil until completely browned. * or Bake at 425 degrees F / 220ºc for 25 to 30 minutes. Add more flour to the batter to make it thick if needed

itemListElement.text: Allow to drain on a paper towel-lined plate.
itemListElement.name: Allow to drain on a paper towel-lined plate.

itemListElement.text: In a clean skillet, heat oil and garlic for 1 minute.
itemListElement.name: In a clean skillet, heat oil and garlic for 1 minute.

itemListElement.text: Add green onions, zest and juice. Cook another 1 minute.
itemListElement.name: Add green onions, zest and juice. Cook another 1 minute.

itemListElement.text: Add soy sauce and vinegar and bring to a boil. Toss in crispy cauliflower into the skillet and coat thoroughly. Keep on the pan briefly.
itemListElement.name: Add soy sauce and vinegar and bring to a boil. Toss in crispy cauliflower into the skillet and coat thoroughly. Keep on the pan briefly.

itemListElement.text: In that same skillet, throw in the remainder ingredients and bring to a boil for just 1 minute, stirring constantly.
itemListElement.name: In that same skillet, throw in the remainder ingredients and bring to a boil for just 1 minute, stirring constantly.

itemListElement.text: Drizzle over orange cauliflower and rice.
itemListElement.name: Drizzle over orange cauliflower and rice.

itemListElement.text: Garnish with green scallions, orange zest, and sesame seeds.
itemListElement.name: Garnish with green scallions, orange zest, and sesame seeds.
